plot: A documentary on the role of animals in the First World War, showing dogs, sheep, camels, burros, horses, mules, cattle and even lions functioning as mascots, pets, and beasts of burden.
title: Our Dumb Friends in the War
plot_es: A documentary on the role of animals in the First World War, showing dogs, sheep, camels, burros, horses, mules, cattle and even lions functioning as mascots, pets, and beasts of burden.
original_name: Our Dumb Friends in the War
plot_en: A documentary on the role of animals in the First World War, showing dogs, sheep, camels, burros, horses, mules, cattle and even lions functioning as mascots, pets, and beasts of burden.
